content: the bitty boho bag is super cute and a great pattern for beginners this pattern includes 64 high quality images to help explain each step and links to the specific supplies used in the pattern sizes this pattern is for a little crochet crossbody bag the finished size of the bag is about 4 5 inches tall and 4 5 inches wide from strap to fringe the entire bag is about 22 inches skill level beginner terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials needed 3oz-4oz worsted weight yarn g 4 0mm crochet hook pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sale my pattern in any way you are more than welcome to sell your finished bitty boho bag i hope they are a very hot item for you you may not use my pictures and pass them off as your own for they are my property thank you for your understanding if you do post any pictures of your finished bag i would love to see them you can use the #bittybohobag or tag me @acraftyconcept on social media so i can see and so other makers can find the pattern for themselves i truly believe there are enough customers to go around so sharing information is a great way for us makers to inspire and encourage each other i can t wait to see your finished bitty boho bag
